D

Decorator - Class in Unnamed Package
The Decorator class is an abstract class that adds extra features to a Graphic object.
Decorator(Graphic) - Constructor for class Decorator
Creates a Decorator for the given Graphic object.
draw() - Method in class Decorator
Calls the draw method of the decorated object.
draw() - Method in class Figure
Draws the circle with the specified color.
draw() - Method in interface Graphic
Draws the graphic object.
draw() - Method in class ShadowDecorator
Draws the shadow effect and then the graphic object itself.
